info.connectWallet: Please Connect Wallet to see Information.

aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.text: Simply put - mining is expensive. Keeping it profitable is another part of the story. Minto aims to lower both the risks and the entry threshold by tokenizing mining power in the form of the BTCMT token.
aboutUs.text2: Receive transparent mining rewards as if you had an ASIC-setup or make profits by buying and selling any amount of mining power without dealing with the problems of traditional mining.
aboutUs.text3: Bitcoin mining has never been easier. Learn more about the future of the mining industry

error.chain: Chain error. Please choose heco-testnet network in your provider.

error.4100: Unauthorized. The requested method and/or account has not been authorized by the user.
error.4200: Unsupported Method. The Provider does not support the requested method.
error.4900: Disconnected. The Provider is disconnected from all chains.
error.4901: Chain Disconnected. The Provider is not connected to the requested chain.
error.0: Probably you have problem with transaction, please check your latest transaction in wallet

home.title: Mine Bitcoin by staking BTCMT tokens
home.subtitle: We've removed all the unnecessary steps and made mining easier than getting a BTC wallet

datacenters.title: Our data centers
datacenters.text: We looked far and wide to find the perfect place to host our project; it had to be up to the highest international technological standards and it had to be capable of expanding as our project grew.
datacenters.text2: Our project is hosted in a gem we found in the Republic of Karelia. The 86,000 square foot, brand new data center is in an ideal location that has enabled us to cut operation costs down to a minimum, thanks to a stable 1Gbit internet connection, smooth logistics and the suitable climate in the region.
datacenters.text3: The facility and operation are in complete compliance with local and international regulations, and the site is maintained by a team of over 150 experienced technicians.

slide.one: The overall energy capacity is 64.5 MW and has been fitted with 3500 of the most advanced ASIC miners, with 50,000 THs of mining power allocatedto Minto. Those figures will increase as the project grows.
slide.two: The data center is powered by a private plant that provides it with cheap, green electricity.
slide.three: The facility's extra square footage opens up opportunities for further scaling at no additional cost.
slide.four: The overall computing capabilities of the facility can be used for scientific calculations, processing big data, rendering and artificial intelligence.

launch.text: We’re launching soon, subscribe to be the first to know!
